Hi! My name is Anne Lohmeijer. I’m a data / platform / DevOps / software engineer with a background in particle physics.

I have 6+ years of experience in the data and ML realm, across multiple industries. Key strengths: software and API development, CICD, DevOps, distributed computing, containerisation, Infrastructure as code, cloud computing.

Experiences

Platform Engineer

Nov 2023 - Present
Ahold Delhaize

Data platform engineer in one of the platform teams that maintain the advanced analytics data platform. Shared responsibilities:

  • build the API that manages user access for data on the advanced analytics data platform
  • build a paved road for integrating data from Confluent Kafka to the platform
  • maintain Unity Catalog
  • operational duties

Tech stack: Python (FastAPI), Azure, Databricks, Unity Catalog, Terraform, Github, Docker.

Platform Engineer

Jan 2023 - Nov 2023
ABN AMRO, Amsterdam

Platform engineer in the enablement team of Strategy & Innovation, which provides engineering teams with the infra required for their application.

  • Key player in setting up the Azure cloud infrastructure for implementation of OpenAI’s ChatGPT within the bank. Within 6 weeks went from start to multi-stage, scalable application.
  • On a daily basis responsible for setting up infra for applications: storage, compute, networking, monitoring, governance, DevOps, CI/CD.

Tools: Terraform, Docker, Gitlab, Kubernetes, Azure, AWS.

Machine Learning Engineer

Sep 2019 - Jan 2023
ABN AMRO, Amsterdam

Projects

  • Played a key role in productionizing the first advanced analytics use case on the data science production platform (K8s cluster) of the bank: a highly scalable emailclassifier that has been deployed to several departments with Operations. Responsible for the MLE part of the models in production.
  • Developed and published several internal NLP modules to handle and process text data.
  • Responsible for the technical effort of productionizing a transaction alert model in the Detecting Financial Crime department.
  • Leading the technical effort of productionizing a document classifier at scale. Classified over 3 million documents / more than 5TB of data in batch mode. This helped ABN AMRO complying to ECB regulations.
  • Lead generation project based on automatic detection of credit needs. Resulted in over 10M euros in loans.
  • Co-leading the team in becoming technically mature (coding standards, best practices, ways of working, etc.)
  • Active role in the MLOps community within the bank.
  • Mentoring several juniors in the team.

Concepts: CICD, MLOps, IaC, containerisation.

Tools: Spark, Python, Azure, MLflow, Databricks, Terraform, Gitlab, Kubernetes.
